titles.title: A resolution to direct the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to further investigate the conduct of Representative Fernand J. St Germain.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Failed of Passage in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 111 - 291 (Record Vote No: 300).

bill.summary: 8/5/1987--Introduced. Directs the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to further investigate the conduct of Representative Fernand J. St Germain and report to the House its findings together with recommendations (for disciplinary action, if any) as deemed appropriate.
